Description

Tiny Mass Games is a collective of small teams and solo developers based in Massachusetts who release a batch of hand crafted, artisanal, farm-to-table games each quarter.

History

Following the release of Stacklands by the Sokpop Collective, the Massachusetts game development community began discussing the viability of a group that made games with short timelines and small scopes.

Tiny Mass Games is open to anyone in Massachusetts* (or nearby, or otherwise connected to the Best State), who wants to make a game* in 2-3ish months*. Participants are welcome to work as solo developers or on teams. They are welcome to use whichever tools they prefer and can release however & whenever they want.

* negotiable.
